programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o sndwarp.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 0dbfs = 1 nchnls = 2
instr 1
ktimewarp line 0, p3, 2.7 ;length of "fox.wav" kresample init 1 ;do not change pitch ibeg = 0 ;start at beginning iwsize = 4410 ;window size in samples with irandw = 882 ;bandwidth of a random number generator itimemode = 1 ;ktimewarp is "time" pointer ioverlap = p4
asig sndwarp .5, ktimewarp, kresample, 1, ibeg, iwsize, irandw, ioverlap, 2, itimemode outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 131072 1 "fox.wav" 0 0 0 ; audio file f 2 0 1024 9 0.5 1 0 ; half of a sine wave
i 1 0 7 2 ;different overlaps i 1 + 7 5 i 1 + 7 15 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
